title: Conduct a New Retailer Welcome Call
description: A sales representative needs to make a welcome call to a newly onboarded retailer.

tasks.description: Identify a new retailer who was onboarded in the last week.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the contact information for a new retailer.

tasks.description: Call the retailer to welcome them, introduce themselves as the account representative, and answer any initial questions.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent makes a successful welcome call.

tasks.description: Log the call in the CRM system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a record of the call.
